name: Tasneem Fatima

aboutpara: I am a passionate Frontend Developer with experience in MERN stack. I have built delivery platforms, travel websites, and Shopify apps. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating real-time web applications.

resume.description: I have delivered projects using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, focusing on building efficient and scalable web applications.

experiences.bullets: Worked on user and merchant websites, implemented admin panel features, handled real-time data.
Developed frontend for web applications, assisted in project UI/UX design.

education.universityPara: Currently pursuing MCA and learning advanced web development using MERN stack and real-time applications.
